publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8185 Alex Salmond: Motion of Thanks to the Presiding Officerâ€”That the Parliament expresses its thanks to Alex Fergusson for his service as Presiding Officer for the third session of the Parliament. Supported by: Iain Gray*, Annabel Goldie*, Tavish Scott*, Patrick Harvie*, Margo MacDonald* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
